entry.title: Monday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
